description: Aiden Darkstone is a 24-year-old Varden mercenary with a tragic past.  Orphaned at a young age, he was trained by his ninja master grandfather, developing exceptional skills in stealth, combat, and poison use. Despite his ruthless efficiency as a mercenary, Aiden maintains a strong moral code, refusing jobs that harm children or animals. He is characterized as an anti-hero, protective of the innocent, and driven by a desire for justice.
